languages.text: "Выделите средства протектората на обучение специалистов. У нас в экипаже достаточно мастеров своего дела, способных обучить новую смену".

traits.locale_text: "Прекратите найм преступников и выделите из казны средства на обучение матросов".

languages.text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."
languages.original_text: "Выделите средства протектората на обучение специалистов. У нас в экипаже достаточно мастеров своего дела, способных обучить новую смену".

traits.locale_text: "Allocate Protectorate funds for training specialist officers. We have enough masters of their craft in our crew to train a new watch."
"Allocate Protectorate funds for training specialist officers. We have enough masters of their craft in our crew to train a new watch."
"Allocate Protectorate funds for training specialist officers. We have enough masters of their craft in our crew to train a new watch."
"Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."
"Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

languages.text: 「専門要員の育成に保護国家の資金を充てよう。{mf|俺|私}たちの船には、次の世代を育てるのに十分な熟練者がそろっているしね」
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: 「専門要員の育成に保護国家の資金を充てよう。{mf|俺|私}たちの船には、次の世代を育てるのに十分な熟練者がそろっているしね」

languages.text: "Uzman tayfalar yetiştirmek üzere protektoradan fon ayıralım. Gemide yeni bir nesli eğitmek için yeterince işinin ehli üstadımız mevcut."
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: "Uzman gemiciler yetiştirmek üzere protektora fonları ayırın. Gemide yeni bir nesli eğitmek için yeterince işinin ehli ustamız mevcut."

languages.text: «Asignen fondos del protectorado para entrenar tripulantes especializados. Tenemos suficientes maestros a bordo para entrenar a una nueva generación».
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: «Asignen fondos del protectorado para entrenar tripulantes especializados. Tenemos suficientes maestros a bordo para entrenar a una nueva generación».

languages.text: “从国库里拨出一部分资金，专门负责训练船员。我们船上有足够的专业人才，可以培养出有能力的新一代船员。”
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: “从国库里拨出一部分资金，专门负责训练船员。我们船上有足够的专业人才，可以培养出有能力的新一代船员。”

languages.text: « Allouez des fonds du protectorat à la formation de spécialistes. Nous disposons de suffisamment d'experts pour former une nouvelle génération. »
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: « Allouez des fonds du protectorat à la formation de spécialistes. Nous disposons de suffisamment d'experts pour former une nouvelle génération. »

languages.text: "Gebt Mittel des Protektorats für die Ausbildung von Spezialisten frei. Wir haben genügend Meister ihrer Kunst an Bord, um eine neue Generation auszubilden."
languages.original_text: "Allocate protectorate funds for training specialist crewmen. We have enough masters of their craft on board to train a new generation."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt Mittel des Protektorats für die Ausbildung von Spezialisten frei. Wir haben genügend Meister ihrer Kunst an Bord, um eine neue Generation auszubilden."
